name: 8.17 "Woody or Won't He" Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 8 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What did Cheers get for the bar?
questions.explanation:
mechanical bull.

	They got the mechanical bull because a restaurant in Texas went out of business. Rebecca was not happy that Cheers got stuck with it.

questions.text: What member of Kelly's family did Woody meet?
questions.explanation:
mother.

	Woody was nervous about meeting Kelly's mother because nobody else in the family liked him, except one person. He said that her mother was his only hope.

questions.text: Why did Cliff not want to use the new item at Cheers?
questions.correct: He was afraid his keys would fly out of his pocket and hurt him.
options: He was scared of animals even fake ones.
He thought that he'd get thrown through a window.
He was afraid his mother would come in and he'd get in trouble.
questions.explanation:
He was afraid his keys would fly out of his pocket and hurt him.

	The others were making fun of Cliff, but Cliff said if they fly out of your pocket you "lose and eye and you'll never enjoy another view-master again."

questions.text: Why did Kelly think she was cynical?
questions.correct: Because her parents split up when Kelly was little
options: Because she was abused as a child
Because she never worked a day in her life
Because she was in love with a country bumpkin'
questions.explanation:
Because her parents split up when Kelly was little.

	The reason Woody had not yet met Kelly's mother was because Kelly's parents were divorced. It didn't say why she lived with her father instead of her mother. She was an adult so it would have been her choice, but perhaps he had custody of her while she was growing up.

questions.text: Why did Sam say the 2nd fork was smaller?
questions.correct: "If you drop that one too it won't make as much noise."
options: "They only had enough metal left to make small forks."
questions.explanation:
"If you drop that one too it won't make as much noise."

	Sam was trying to teach Woody food etiquette. Woody learned the difference between forks but didn't understand why they were different sizes. Sam not knowing the answer just made up something.

Kelly's mother.

	Woody became even more nervous as Kelly's mom hit on him. Sam told him he was probably misinterpreting her kindness for flirtation.

questions.text: What did Woody say at the Gaines' dinner party?
questions.correct: that he won't have sex with Kelly's mother
options: that he dropped both of his forks
that he wanted to marry Kelly
that he was in love with Kelly's mom
questions.explanation:
that he won't have sex with Kelly's mother.

	This scene is very funny. He jumps up from the table and yells "I'm not having sex with you! I won't have sex with you! I won't! I wont'! I won't! No sex! Do you hear me? Now I want both hands and both feet on the table now." Everyone, of course, looked at Woody like he's lost it. He doesn't know why so he asked Kelly, "Am I using the wrong fork or something?"

questions.text: Did Kelly break up with Woody?
questions.explanation:
no.

	Kelly said that Woody was the first person to be rude to her mother. He apologized when Kelly said that her mom always flirts with her new boyfriends.

questions.text: Who hasn't Woody blown it with, according to Woody?
questions.explanation:
Aunt Martha.

	Aunt Martha was crazy so Woody thought that she didn't really count. Aunt Martha thought that Woody was Winston Churchill. Kelly pointed out that he didn't blow it with her, and that was what really mattered.

questions.text: What did Sam take from the Gaines' house?
questions.explanation:
cold cuts.

	Sam invested money in stock that went down. It turned out that the people he went in with had bad luck and no matter what stock they invested in, it went down and they lost money.
